Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan will start as favourites to win this match against Afghanistan.
A win against Afghanistan would be highly beneficial for the Pakistan team in reaching the finals of the Asia Cup.

Babar Azam's form has been a concern for the team but the promotion of Mohammad Nawaz at #4 proved game-changing and the batting order looks stable with the likes of Fakhar Zaman, Khushdil Shah & Iftikhar Ahmed.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan vs Afghanistan Head-to-Head: Total – 02, Pakistan – 02, Afghanistan – 00, Tied – 00, No Result – 00
Others: Mohammad Rizwan was admitted to the hospital after sustaining a minor injury against India, and is expected to play the match against Afghanistan.
